name: Twin Galaxy
description:
Twin Galaxy is set in space with two spaceships at constant odds with each other.

You job is to safely navigate them through the mazes and pick up some secrets along the way

The game is "finished"!
After many days of slamming my head on the table, the game finally got finished. This honestly isn't the best showcase of what I want the game to be, however it is my first game so some things may not go as planned.

That being said, i'm planning on updating the game every week with new content so stay tuned for that
